channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Will a HELOC or home equity loan be better in 2026? Lending experts weigh in
item.description: Both products provide financing with traditionally low rates, but there are unique benefits and downsides to both.

item.title: ICE arrests woman with family connection to WH press secretary Karoline Leavitt
item.description: U.S. immigration authorities have detained a woman who is the mother of White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt's nephew, according to a source.

item.title: WATCH: Massive fire engulfs Hong Kong apartment complex
item.description: At least 13 people have been killed and dozens injured in the blaze that has engulfed a residential apartment complex in Hong Kong.

item.title: Campbell Soup executive made offensive customer remarks, lawsuit claims
item.description: The complaint alleges that a Campbell executive made offensive remarks about company workers and mocked customers.
